item.title: [wip sodisant] it’s a mess you fix it
item.dc:creator: Etzecon
item.description:
https://app.auxy.co/projects/RTlF2zVdeWBfurbmxL635w==

Hey man, thanks for being vulnerable and posting your stuff, I really liked the idea… I changed it up a tiny bit but tried to keep your great ideas as a base… some tips I would give you are, I have found the hard way that distorting the crap out of stuff is not always the way to go, even if you want it to sound big… second, the idea with all the quick triplets was interesting, but I don’t think it was really working on this song … but dude keep working on it from here it’ll get better! Thank you!

Read full topic
